name: Spell-warped Chuul
description: The Spell-warped Chuul has a large, formidable presence, with powerful pincers and a carapace that houses a wand of lightning bolts. It can grapple foes effectively and uses its magical abilities to enhance its attacks.
memorable: It gains temporary hit points from absorbed magic, making it a growing threat in battle.
goals: To attack and incapacitate opponents using its grappling abilities and magical resistance.
relations: May be encountered with other aberrations or magical creatures.
environment: Typically found in aquatic environments, capable of moving through both water and land.
strengths: Immunities to poison and advantages against magical effects enhance its durability in combat.
weaknesses: Lower Dexterity and Intelligence scores may hinder its evasiveness and strategic combat abilities.
attacks: Utilizes multiattacks with pincers to deal bludgeoning damage while grappling foes.
most_powerful_ability: Spell-warped abilities allow it to absorb magic, gaining temporary hit points and increasing its damage output.
equipment: Has a wand of lightning bolts integrated into its carapace.
senses: It has a passive Perception of 13, providing decent awareness of its surroundings.
skills: The chuul lacks specific skill proficiencies but has good Wisdom for perception.
additional_information: Can breathe both air and water, making it versatile in combat.
Pincer attacks can inflict additional force damage while grappling.
The Sparking Wand deals lightning damage to creatures nearby.
When attacked by a magic weapon, it grants disadvantage on future attacks from that weapon.
It can paralyze foes with its Tentacle attack.
test_queries: spell-warped creature with temporary hit points
